patch 8.1.2020: it is not easy to change the window layout

Problem:    It is not easy to change the window layout.
Solution:   Add win_splitmove(). (Andy Massimino, closes #4561)
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2020: it is not easy to change the window layout
attachments.text:
patch 8.1.2020: it is not easy to change the window layout

Problem:    It is not easy to change the window layout.
Solution:   Add win_splitmove(). (Andy Massimino, closes #4561)

text: 割と直感的なインターフェースだし、ウインドウの移動するたび沢山の Ex コマンドを使う事がなくなりそう (:close, :wincmd, ...)
:memo: vim内で動作する15分タイマーほしい (残り時間が表示され続ける感じで)
プレゼンで使うやつかな
文字サイズを小さくできないけど、それでもよければ作れそう
逆に文字サイズ変えたいなら Vim 内で動作させるのは無理

```
:terminal bash -c "for i in `seq 60 -1 1` ; do echo -ne \"\\r$i \" ; sleep 1 ; done"
```
gvimext のビルドでエラーが出てる。

```
mingw32-make -C GvimExt -f Make_ming.mak CROSS=no CROSS_COMPILE= CXX='g++' STATIC_STDCPLUS=yes
mingw32-make[1]: Entering directory 'C:/vim/src/GvimExt'
g++ -shared -static-libgcc -static-libstdc++ -O2 -s -o gvimext.dll \
	-Wl,--enable-auto-image-base \
	-Wl,--enable-auto-import \
	-Wl,--whole-archive \
		gvimext.o gvimext.res gvimext_ming.def \
	-Wl,--no-whole-archive \
		-luuid -lgdi32
c:/msys64/mingw64/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-w64-mingw32/9.2.0/../../../../x86_64-w64-mingw32/bin/ld.exe: c:/msys64/mingw64/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-w64-mingw32/9.2.0/../../../../x86_64-w64-mingw32/lib/../lib/libuuid.a(lib64_libuuid_a-uuid.o):uuid.c:(.rdata+0x640): multiple definition of `FMTID_ImageSummaryInformation'; gvimext.o:gvimext.cpp:(.rdata$FMTID_ImageSummaryInformation[FMTID_ImageSummaryInformation]+0x0): first defined here
c:/msys64/mingw64/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-w64-mingw32/9.2.0/../../../../x86_64-w64-mingw32/bin/ld.exe: c:/msys64/mingw64/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-w64-mingw32/9.2.0/../../../../x86_64-w64-mingw32/lib/../lib/libuuid.a(lib64_libuuid_a-uuid.o):uuid.c:(.rdata+0x650): multiple definition of `FMTID_MediaFileSummaryInformation'; gvimext.o:gvimext.cpp:(.rdata$FMTID_MediaFileSummaryInformation[FMTID_MediaFileSummaryInformation]+0x0): first defined here
c:/msys64/mingw64/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-w64-mingw32/9.2.0/../../../../x86_64-w64-mingw32/bin/ld.exe: c:/msys64/mingw64/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-w64-mingw32/9.2.0/../../../../x86_64-w64-mingw32/lib/../lib/libuuid.a(lib64_libuuid_a-uuid.o):uuid.c:(.rdata+0x660): multiple definition of `FMTID_AudioSummaryInformation'; gvimext.o:gvimext.cpp:(.rdata$FMTID_AudioSummaryInformation[FMTID_AudioSummaryInformation]+0x0): first defined here
collect2.exe: error: ld returned 1 exit status
mingw32-make[1]: *** [Make_ming.mak:66: gvimext.dll] Error 1
mingw32-make[1]: Leaving directory 'C:/vim/src/GvimExt'
mingw32-make: *** [Make_cyg_ming.mak:1052: GvimExt/gvimext.dll] Error 2
```
マルチプルいうてるから、移動させたときに古い方を消してないのかな?

attachments.text: Today I tried to build latest version of vim but my build script returned errors. Previously it worked perfectly for a several years. I am using msys2 x64 on windows 10. Here is the command: mingw3...

text: 最近mingwのヘッダかライブラリでも更新されたのかな？
INITGUID してるので実体宣言が含まれてそう。
